required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Human Bioequivalence Test of Liraglutide Injection
clinical_study.official_title: Human Bioequivalence Test of Liraglutide Injection

lead_sponsor.agency: Chia Tai Tianqing Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: Chia Tai Tianqing Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the bioequivalence of The liraglutide injection produced by Chia Tai Tianqing Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd. and Victoza® produced by Novo Nordisk (China) Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd for single dose in healthy subjects,so as to provide reference for clinical evaluation and clinical medication;To observe the safety of the test preparation liraglutide injection and the reference preparation Victoza ® in healthy subjects.

primary_outcome.time_frame: 0 hour（pre-dose,within 60mins） to 72hours after administration on day1 and day 15.

primary_outcome.measure: Time to reach maximum (peak) plasma concentration following drug administration (Tmax)
primary_outcome.time_frame: 0 hour（pre-dose,within 60mins） to 72hours after administration on day1 and day 15.

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve from time zero to time t (AUC0-t)
primary_outcome.time_frame: 0 hour（pre-dose, within 60 mins） to 72 hours after administration on day1 and day 15.
primary_outcome.description: The area under the plasma concentration curve from 0 to infinity

primary_outcome.measure: Terminal disposition rate constant/terminal rate constant (λz)
primary_outcome.time_frame: 0 hour（pre-dose, within 60 mins） to 72 hours after administration on day1 and day 15.
0 hour（pre-dose, within 60 mins） to 72 hours after administration on day1 and day 15.
primary_outcome.description: The time required for the highest concentration of the drug in plasma to decrease by half

primary_outcome.measure: Apparent total clearance of the drug from plasma after oral administration (CL/F)
primary_outcome.time_frame: 0 hour（pre-dose, within 60 mins） to 72 hours after administration on day1 and day 15.

primary_outcome.measure: Apparent volume of distribution after non-intravenous administration (Vd/F)
primary_outcome.time_frame: 0 hour（pre-dose, within 60 mins） to 72 hours after administration on day1 and day 15.

primary_outcome.measure: Bioavailability (systemic availability of the administered dose)
primary_outcome.time_frame: 0 hour（pre-dose, within 60mins） to 72 hours after administration on day1 and day 15.

primary_outcome.measure: Adverse Event, Serious Adverse Event and Drug Combination
primary_outcome.description: Monitor the safety indicators of subjects during the trial

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 hour before administration and 2 hours, 10 hours, 24 hours, 48 hours, 72 hours after administration on day 1 and day 15
1 hour before administration and 2 hours, 10 hours, 24 hours, 48 hours, 72 hours after administration on day 1 and day 15
1 hour before administration and 2 hours, 10 hours, 24 hours, 48 hours, 72 hours after administration on day 1 and day 15
From the screening period to day 18 after the first administration
secondary_outcome.description: Any discomfort spontaneously reported by the subject

secondary_outcome.measure: The Number of participants with treatment-related adverse events as assessed by CTCAE v5.0 (physical examination)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the screening period to day 18 after the first administration
secondary_outcome.description: Monitor the safety indicators of subjects during the trial，For example: skin, mucous membrane, head (head, eyes, ears, nose, mouth), neck, chest (chest, breast, lung, heart), abdomen (liver, gallbladder, spleen, kidney, bladder), spine, limbs, nervous system, lymph nodes, etc，and calculate the Number of participants with treatment-related adverse events as assessed by CTCAE v5.0

secondary_outcome.measure: The Number of participants with abnormal laboratory examinations
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the screening period to day 18 after the first administration
secondary_outcome.description: laboratory examination, such as liver function, kidney function, coagulation function, blood routine, urine routine

arm_group.description: Subjects receive liraglutide injection in the first cycle and Victoza in the second cycle.
Subjects receive Victoza in the first cycle and liraglutide injection in the second cycle.

facility.name: Affiliated Hospital of Changchun University of Traditional Chinese Medicine
